    • class SpotStatus

    Attributes

    int n public
    Number of normal observations (not the alarms)
    int ex_up public
    Current number of up excesses
    int ex_down public
    Current number of down excesses
    int Nt_up public
    Total number of up excesses
    int Nt_down public
    Total number of down excesses
    int al_up public
    Number of up alarms
    int al_down public
    Number of down alarms
    double t_up public
    initial batch (for calibration) transitional up threshold
    double t_down public
    transitional down threshold
    double z_up public
    up alert thresholds
    double z_down public
    down alert thresholds

    Methods

    string str() public
    Format the status to print it.
